sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout/Layout'; import './Contact.css'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', studentGrade: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Form validation and submission logic would go here setIsSubmitted(true); // Reset form after submission setTimeout(() => { setIsSubmitted(false); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', studentGrade: '', subject: '', message: '' }); }, 3000); }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Get in Touch With Our School

We're here to answer all your questions and support your educational journey

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Contact Form Section */}

Send Us a Message

{isSubmitted ? (

Thank You for Contacting Us!

We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

) : (

reCAPTCHA will be integrated here

)}
{/* Contact Information */}

{/* Map Section */}

 ); }; export default Contact;
